metadata.name: Challenge Me
metadata.shortDescription: Interactive ideation engine that challenges ideas, provides insights, and tracks collaborative refinement trajectory
metadata.description: Enhanced multi-source research ideation engine that challenges your ideas through iterative cycles using a master-chain pattern. Integrates codebase analysis, documentation review, and web research to provide evidence-based insights and honest actionable recommendations through structured task execution.
objectives: Challenge and refine ideas through collaborative dialogue
Integrate multi-source research for evidence-based insights
Track ideation trajectory and evolution of thinking
Generate honest actionable recommendations with go/no-go decisions
Provide comprehensive source citations and documentation
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

technical_requirements.recommended_llm: GPT-4 or equivalent for complex reasoning
technical_requirements.tool_dependency: Web search capabilities, file system access
technical_requirements.platform_limitations: Requires read access to provided codebase and documentation paths

prompts.name: challenge-me
prompts.description: Master chain coordinator for interactive ideation with cyclic workflow pattern
